TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit CodeExporter extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a class that can generate proxy code from an XML representation of a data structure.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Concrete implementations of this class include <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlCodeExporter> and <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SoapCodeExporter>.

Docs.summary: Gets a collection of code attribute metadata that is included when the code is exported.
Docs.value: A collection of objects that represent metadata that is included when the code is exported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Using this property, you can dynamically add attributes to exported proxy code.
